title: New home for Shriram Housing Finance: Private equity funds close in on deal
description: Parent Shriram Finance, which is mainly involved in commercial vehicle financing, owns 84.82% of Shriram Housing Finance Ltd, which focuses on affordable homes. San Francisco-based PE Valiant Capital Management owns most of the remaining stake.
